name: Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi: Kaznapped!
description:
Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi: Kaznapped! is an arcade game developed by Altron. It was originally released in 2005. D3 Publisher published the game.
You can play Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi: Kaznapped! on Game Boy Advance.
Ashley Postlewaite produced the game. It was directed by Darin McGowan, Darrell Van Citters, Howie Perry and Scott O'Brien. Andy Sturmer and Puffy AmiYumi scored the game.
